Package ohos.agp.render.render3d

Interface ViewHolder


  • public interface ViewHolder
    Extracts a specific component that is used for rendering.
    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  ViewHolder.BitmapListener
      Provides the listener for events of obtaining component contents in the form of bitmap.
      static interface  ViewHolder.SurfaceListener
      Provides the listener for surface events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TargetBuffer getTargetBuffer​()
      Obtains the TargetBuffer that can be used to draw content on the component held by a ViewHolder.
      Component getView​()
      Obtains a component connected to the component holder.
      void release​()
      Releases the surface held by a ViewHolder.
      void setOpaque​(boolean isOpaque)
      Sets whether the surface is opaque.
      void setSurfaceListener​(ViewHolder.SurfaceListener listener)
      Sets a surface listener used to track lifetime events of the surface.

    • Method Detail

      • setSurfaceListener

        void setSurfaceListener​(ViewHolder.SurfaceListener listener)
        Sets a surface listener used to track lifetime events of the surface.
        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the listener to set.

      • getView

        Component getView​()
        Obtains a component connected to the component holder.
        Returns:
        Returns the component connected to the component holder.

      • release

        void release​()
        Releases the surface held by a ViewHolder.

      • getTargetBuffer

        TargetBuffer getTargetBuffer​()
        Obtains the TargetBuffer that can be used to draw content on the component held by a ViewHolder.

        If TargetBuffer is used as the drawing target of an engine, the ViewHolder should be passed to the engine. For details, see Engine#setDefaultTargetBuffer(TargetBuffer).

        Returns:
        Returns the target buffer.

      • setOpaque

        void setOpaque​(boolean isOpaque)
        Sets whether the surface is opaque.
        Parameters:
        isOpaque - Indicates whether the surface is opaque. true indicates that the surface is opaque.
